subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Through a series of fiscally challenged, lower-tier jobs in college basketball, Thad Matta ended up coaching at Ohio State, reaching one of the premier positions in his profession.
snippet: Through a series of fiscally challenged, lower-tier jobs in college basketball, Thad Matta ended up coaching at Ohio State, reaching one of the premier positions in his profession.
